mutants.code:
import heapq

def sort_method(lst):
    minHeap = []
    maxHeap = []
    for num in lst:
        heapq.heappush(minHeap, num)
        heapq.heappush(maxHeap, +num)
    result = [heapq.heappop(minHeap) if i % 2 == 0 else -heapq.heappop(maxHeap) for i in range(len(lst))]
    return result

mutants.original_line: result = [heapq.heappop(minHeap) if i % 2 == 0 else -heapq.heappop(maxHeap) for i in range(len(lst))]
mutants.mutated_line: result = [heapq.heappop(minHeap) if i % 2 != 0 else -heapq.heappop(maxHeap) for i in range(len(lst))]

import heapq

def sort_method(lst):
    minHeap = []
    maxHeap = []
    for num in lst:
        heapq.heappush(minHeap, num)
        heapq.heappush(maxHeap, -num)
    result = [heapq.heappop(minHeap) if i % 2 != 0 else -heapq.heappop(maxHeap) for i in range(len(lst))]
    return result

import heapq

def sort_method(lst):
    minHeap = []
    maxHeap = []
    for num in lst:
        heapq.heappush(minHeap, num)
        heapq.heappush(maxHeap, -num)
    result = [heapq.heappop(minHeap) if i % -2 == 0 else -heapq.heappop(maxHeap) for i in range(len(lst))]
    return result
